mapper.select: select a.id, a.bank_card_id, a.settlement_account_type, a.occupation, b.bank_account_name, b.bank_card_no, b.bank_card_mobile, b.bank_card_url, b.bank_name, b.bank_sub_branch_name, b.bank_branch_code,b.eicon_bank_branch, b.open_account_province, b.open_account_province_name, b.open_account_city, b.open_account_city_name, b.open_account_district, b.open_account_district_name from tf_incoming_settle_info a left join tf_bank_card_info b on a.bank_card_id = b.id and b.is_deleted = 0 where a.id = #{id} and a.is_deleted = 0;
